name: Basil Parmesan Spread (Red, White, and Green Christmas Appetizer)
author: bricallahan
summary: Colorful appetizer spread for Christmas or holiday parties. Serve with assorted crackers and/or bread.
ingredients: 1 cup loosely packed, coarsely chopped fresh spinach
1 cup loosely packed fresh basil leaves
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (4 ounce) log Montrachet goat cheese, at room temperature
¼ cup sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained and thinly sliced
directions: Line a 3-cup bowl with plastic wrap, leaving a 4-inch overhang
Combine spinach, basil, and garlic in a food processor and chop finely
Add Parmesan cheese and process until almost smooth
Keep processor running while pouring in oil; process until a smooth paste forms
Mix cream cheese and goat cheese together in a bowl
Spread 1/3 of the cheese mixture in the bottom of the prepared bowl
Spread 1/2 of the spinach mixture on top
Repeat with remaining cheese mixture, spinach mixture, walnuts, and tomatoes, ending with cheese mixture
Fold plastic overhang on top and gently push down to compress layers
Refrigerate for 8 hours, or up to 3 days
Unfold plastic top and invert bowl onto a serving plate
Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes before serving
